```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_rds(here::here("dataset", "Population by race and sex per year.rds"))

data |>
  group_by(race) |>
  filter(sex != "Total") |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = Total, fill = sex), show.legend = TRUE) +
  facet_wrap(~race, ncol = 3, nrow = 2) +
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 3)
```
